GK19dandkc_u:3366_1: karomi tāvadevāṅganāthena siṃhavarmaṇā svasāhāyyāyākārito 'tra samāgataḥ pūrvapuṇyaparipākātsvāminā samagaṃsi' iti //
GK19dandkc_u:3367: iti śradaṇḍinaḥ kṛtau daśakumāracarite viśrutacaritaṃ nāmāṣṭama ucchvāsaḥ //
GK19dandkc_u:3370_1: kumārāḥ pāṭalipure yauvarājyamupabhuñjānaṃ samākāraṇe pūrvakṛtasaṃketaṃ vāmalocanayā
GK19dandkc_u:3370_2: bhāryayā saha kumāraṃ somadattaṃ sevakairānāyya sarājavāhanāḥ saṃbhūyāvasthitā mithaḥ
GK19dandkc_u:3371: etajjanakasya rājahaṃsasyājñāpatra gṛhyatām' ityākarṇya samutthāya bhūyobhūyaḥ sādaraṃ praṇamya sadasi tadājñāpatramagrahīt /
GK19dandkc_u:3372_0: śirasi cādhāya tata uttāryotkīlya rājā rājavāhanaḥ sarveṣāṃ śṛṇvatāmevāvācayat-“svasti
GK19dandkc_u:3373: yathā yūyamito māmāmantrya praṇamya prasthitāḥ pathi kasmiṃścidvanoddeśa upaśivālayaṃ skandhāvāramavasthāpya sthitāḥ /
GK19dandkc_u:3374_0: tatra rājavāhanaṃ śivapūjārthaṃniśi śivālaye sthitaṃ prātaranupalabhyāvaśiṣṭāḥ sarve
GK19dandkc_u:3374_1: 'pi kumārāḥ “sahaiva rājavāhanena rājahaṃsaṃ praṇaṃsyāmo na cetprāṇāṃstyakṣyāmaḥ'
GK19dandkc_u:3374_2: iti pratijñāya sainyaṃ parāvartya rājavāhanamanveṣṭaṃ pṛthakprasthitāḥ /
GK19dandkc_u:3375_2: vidhāya prāṇaparityāyaṃ kurvaḥ' iti niścitya tadāśramamupagatau taṃ muniṃ praṇamya
GK19dandkc_u:3375_3: yāvatsthitau tāvadeva tena trikālavedinā muninā viditamevāsmanmanīṣitam /
GK19dandkc_u:3378_1: vikrameṇa vihitadigvijayāḥ prabhūtāni rājyānyupalabhya ṣoḍhaśābdānte vijayinaṃ rājavāhanaṃ
GK19dandkc_u:3378_2: puraskṛtya pratyetya tava vasumatyāśca pādānabhivādya bhavadājñāvidhāyino bhaviṣyanti /
GK19dandkc_u:3379: atastannimittaṃ kimapi sāhasaṃ na vidheyam' iti /
GK19dandkc_u:3382: tvaduktāvadhiḥ pūrṇaprāyo bhavati tatpravṛttistvayādyāpi vijñāyate' iti /
GK19dandkc_u:3384: rājavāhanapramukhāḥ sarve 'pi kumārā anekāndurjayāñśatrūnvijitya digvijayaṃ vidhāya bhūvalayaṃ vaśīkṛtya campāyāmekatra sthitāḥ /
GK19dandkc_u:3385: tavājñāpatramādāya tadānayanāya preṣyantāṃ śīghrameva sevakāḥ' iti munivacanamākarṇya bhavadākāraṇāyājñāpatraṃ preṣitamasti /
GK19dandkc_u:3386: ataḥparaṃ cetkṣaṇamapi yūyaṃ vilambaṃ vidhāsyatha tato māṃ vasumatīṃ ca mātaraṃ kathāvaśeṣāveva śroṣyatheti jñātvā pānīyamapi pathi bhūtvā peyam' iti /
GK19dandkc_u:3387: evaṃ piturājñāpatraṃ mūrdhni vidhṛtya gacchemeti niścayaṃ cakruḥ /
GK19dandkc_u:3388_1: niyujya kiyatā sainyaina mārgarakṣāṃ vidhāya pūrvavariṇaṃ mālaveśaṃ mānasāra parājatya
GK19dandkc_u:3388_2: tadapi rājyaṃ vaśīkṛtya puṣpapure rājño rājahaṃsasya devyā vasumatyāśca pādānnamasyāmaḥ /
GK19dandkc_u:3389: evaṃ niścitya svasvabhāryāsaṃyutāḥ parimitena sainyana mālaveśaṃ prati prasthitāḥ /
GK19dandkc_u:3390: prāpya cojjayinīṃ tadaiva sahāyabhūtaistaiḥ kumāraiḥ parimitena rājavāhanenātibalavānapi mālaveśo mānasāraḥ kṣaṇena parājigye nihataśca /
GK19dandkc_u:3391_0: tatastaddahitaramavantisundarīṃ samādāya caṇjavarmaṇā tanmantriṇā pūrvaṃ kārāgṛhe
GK19dandkc_u:3391_1: rakṣitaṃ puṣpodbhavaṃ kumāraṃ sakuṭumbaṃ tata unmocitaṃ saha nītvā mālavendrarājyaṃ
GK19dandkc_u:3391_3: kumārāḥ puṣpapuraṃ sametya rājavāhanaṃ puraskṛtya tasya rājahaṃsasya māturvasumatyāśca
GK19dandkc_u:3394: samakṣaṃ vāmadevo rājavāhanapramukhānāṃ daśānāmapi kumārāṇāmabhilāṣaṃ vijñāya tānājñāpayat--bhavantaḥ sarve 'pyekavāraṃ gatvā svāni svāni rājyāni nyāyena paripālayantu /
GK19dandkc_u:3396: tataste sarve 'pi kumārāstanmunivacanaṃ śiramyādhāyā taṃ praṇamya pitarau ca,
GK19dandkc_u:3397: gatvā digvijayaṃ vidhāya pratyāgamanāntaṃ svasvavṛttaṃ pṛthakpṛthaḍmunisamakṣaṃ nyavedayan /
GK19dandkc_u:3398: pitarau ca kumārāṇāṃ nijaparākramāvabodhakānyatidurghaṭāni caritānyākarṇya paramānandamāpnutām /
GK19dandkc_u:3401: ataḥparaṃ mama svābhicaraṇasaṃnidhau vānaprasthāśramamau tyātmasādhanameva vidhātumucitam /
GK19dandkc_u:3402_1: kumārebhyo yathocitaṃ sampradāya te kumārā rājavāhanājñābidhāyinastadekamatyā vartamānāścaturudadhimekhalāṃ
GK19dandkc_u:3402_2: vasuṃdharāṃ samuddhṛtya kaṇṭakānupabhuñjanti tathā vidheyaṃ svāminā iti /
GK19dandkc_u:3404: ayaṃ yuṣmajjanaka etadvayaḥsamucite pathi varmānaḥ kāyakleśaṃ vinava madāśramastho vānapraśthāśramāśrayaṇaṃ sarvathā bhavaddharni nivāraṇīyaḥ /
GK19dandkc_u:3406: bhavantaśca pitṛsaṃnidhau na sukhamavāpsthanti' iti maharṣerājñāmadhigamya te piturvānaprasthāśramādhigamapratiṣedhāgrahamatyajan /
GK19dandkc_u:3407: rājavāhanaṃ puṣpapure 'vasthāpya tadanujñayā sarve 'pi parijanāḥ svāni svāni rājyāni pratipālya svecchayā pitro samīpa gatāgatamakurvan /
GK19dandkc_u:3408_0: evamavasthitāste rājavāhanapramukhāḥ sarve 'pi kumārā rājavāhanājñayā sarvamapi vasudhāvalayaṃ
